phase_description: Plan drift detection, error loop detection, confusion pattern detection, scope creep detection, and graduated intervention system.

selected_ticket.title: Graduated intervention system
selected_ticket.description: Implement InterventionManager class with graduated responses: Level 1 warning on first detection, Level 2 auto-clear suggestion on second. Aggregates all detector reports. Debouncing and configurable thresholds.

next_action: Build CMH-023 - Graduated intervention system. Create branch feature/CMH-023-graduated-intervention. Implement InterventionManager class.
